title: Coulombs law - sphere weight equals electric force

content.description: Two nonconducting spheres have different radii <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"> <mi>R</mi> </math> and <math alttext="the fraction R over 2" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>, but the same mass <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> and the same uniform charge density <math alttext="rho" overflow="scroll"><mi>ρ</mi></math>.
